name: The Librarian (The Librarian)
description:
Meet Tom the Librarian. Tom enjoys keeping the library in order. But wait, who has left these notes inside the books?

You can move Tom around with the arrow keys or WASD while they keep finding new notes every now and then. Can you solve the mystery behind the notes?

All the music created by Olli Heino (https://soundcloud.com/olliheinomusic).

Banner art created by Christina "Chride" Lassheikki.

#FGJ21 #GGJOnline
